title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: Integrated STEM Leadership Development Using Design-Based Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding fundamental science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) concepts and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can plan integrated STEM projects for solving social issues by applying the design thinking process.
Learners can execute prototyping processes using digital fabrication technologies such as 3D printing.
Learners can manage team projects in a collaborative learning environment based on distributed cognition theory.
Learners can design task-specific STEM education programs by applying the 4C/ID model.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
